title: Why last hitting the nexus gives gold?

replies.body: The same reason killing riven gives gold, it exists but you can never make use of it.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Sesshomaru,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=XTFzKQml,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-15T00:34:14.574+0000)
>
> The same reason killing riven gives gold, it exists but you can never make use of it.

true dat

Because everybody knows if your 50 gold short of an item, you better kill the nexus. 
You get your 50 gold you were short of.
maybe its to buy drinks for friends after game idk
So you know you are the MVP.
